description: Bridgedale’s Midweight ski socks have an over-the-calf sock height with breathable merino wool. Designed to keep the user comfortable all day on the mountain, in the back country, or out snowshoeing by your favorite frozen lake.
name: Bridgedale Ski Midweight Socks - Mens

specs.value: 25% Merino Wool, 48% Nylon, 25% Polypropylene, 2% Lycra Spandex
